name: Kongamato
movement: 60 ft. walking speed and 10 ft. flying speed
description: The Kongamato is a large beast known for its ferocity in combat and immense strength, with powerful beak and claw attacks.
memorable: Its ability to deal double damage to wooden objects makes it particularly dangerous in environments with wooden structures.
goals: Typically found hunting or defending its territory aggressively.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other large beasts or in regions with abundant wildlife.
environment: Commonly found in areas with trees and water, where it can utilize its flying and grappling abilities.
strengths: Very good at physical tasks, with high strength and dexterity.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, lacking social or tactical acumen.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with one beak and two claw attacks, grappling targets effectively.
most_powerful_ability: Terrifying Screech, which can frighten multiple foes and deal significant thunder damage.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 13, allowing it to notice hidden threats effectively.
skills: Proficient in perception, making it aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Flyby ability allows it to avoid opportunity attacks when flying.
Can drag grappling creatures while flying.
Known for its aggressive nature in combat.
test_queries: formidable beast that damages wooden objects
menacing creature with strong beak attacks
